bug.author: kwea123
bug.summary: Bug in floor generation with realtime_mode=True
bug.description:
When using , I can set the floor correctly. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11364490/52866191-85fcf300-3181-11e9-9893-42da4176deef.png></denchmark-link>
But using , no matter what floor I set, it displays floor 0, and the visual theme is also floor 0: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11364490/52866320-be9ccc80-3181-11e9-8025-df53dd0e7ca6.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11364490/52866325-bfcdf980-3181-11e9-958f-f7d2757428e0.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kwea123>@kwea123</denchmark-link> , Thanks for pointing this out. It is indeed a bug, and we will try to fix it soon.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kwea123>@kwea123</denchmark-link> , This has been fixed in the new v1.2 binary. Download it here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/obstacle-tower-env/tree/v1.2>https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/obstacle-tower-env/tree/v1.2</denchmark-link> .
I confirm that the bug is fixed.
